message.name: Jamie Smith
message.body: Yo, fellas, has anyone heard from Erin today? ðŸ¤” Was supposed to meet her at the library today but she didn't show

message.name: Alex Martinez
message.body: Nah bro, haven't heard from her since yesterday. She said something 'bout going to that new exhibit at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Maybe she got caught up there? ðŸŽ¨

message.name: Mia Williams
message.body: Guuuys, I'm getting worried now ðŸ˜Ÿ We should've heard from her by now. She ain't the type to just vanish like this.

message.name: Jamie Smith
message.body: True that, Mia. Let's not freak out though. Lemme try calling her again

message.name: Alex Martinez
message.body: While you're at it, Jamie, someone should reach out to her folks too. They might know something.

message.name: Mia Williams
message.body: Good call, Alex. I'll hit up Mrs. Johnson. She's always been chill with us. Call me on 07873 876123 ðŸ“²

message.name: Jamie Smith
message.body: Still no answer guys. Her phone is going straight to voicemail. ðŸ˜“
